tool_description: This API provides above 40000 Arabic quotes by Dr Abdulaziz Almotawa.
title: Dr Almotawa Quotes

api_list.name: Get random quote
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a random quote out of over 40000 quotes

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: This parameter is to get a quote with characters length less than the number specified
